solution_line_template: Before Cameron broke his hand he could type {minutes} × {wpm_before_break} = <<{minutes}*{wpm_before_break}={words_before_break}>>{words_before_break} words in {minutes} minutes.
After he broke his hand he could only type {minutes} × {wpm_after_break} = <<{minutes}*{wpm_after_break}={words_after_break}>>{words_after_break} words in {minutes} minutes.

The difference between the number of words he could type in {minutes} minutes before and after he broke his arm is {words_before_break} - {words_after_break} = <<{words_before_break}-{words_after_break}={difference}>>{difference} words.
